writer.name: 科里·迈克尔·尤班克斯 Corey Michael Eubanks

director.name: 科里·迈克尔·尤班克斯 Corey Michael Eubanks

introduction: An 11 year old boy. An age old legend. A life long friendship。After a wildlife painter spots Bigfoot in the northern wilderness and takes photographs and videotapes the encounter, a frantic chase begins between a ruthless businessman who will stop at nothing to acquire this “prize,” offering a million dollars for Bigfoot’s capture dead or alive, and an anthropological team bent on capturing him for the sake of learning more about evolution.   Unintentionally caught in the middle is Cody, a small boy who gets lost in the woods and is saved from a bear attack by the object of all this attention, who he discovers is gentle, kind, and knows the true meaning of friendship.   Cody must later return the favor, striving to save his sasquatch buddy from the bounty hunters…
